hero.title: Yomi Robotic Dental Implants
hero.subtitle: Pioneering the Future of Precision Dentistry with Cutting-Edge Robotic Technology
hero.description: We are revolutionizing dental implant surgery with the Yomi robotic system, delivering faster, safer, and more personalized dental implants with unmatched precision.

doctor.name: Dr. Gregory Pedro, DMD
doctor.title: Certified Yomi Robotic Surgery Specialist
credentials: Temple University School of Dentistry - DMD
doctor.experience: Pioneer in robotic dental implant surgery with extensive training on the Yomi system and over 500 robotic procedures performed

yomi_features.title: FDA-Approved Precision
yomi_features.description: Yomi is the first and only FDA-approved robotic system for dental implant surgery, ensuring the highest safety and precision standards.

yomi_features.title: 3D Surgical Planning
yomi_features.description: Advanced pre-surgical planning using 3D imaging creates a precise surgical roadmap for optimal implant placement.

yomi_features.title: Minimally Invasive Surgery
yomi_features.description: Robotic precision enables smaller incisions and less tissue trauma for faster healing and reduced discomfort.

yomi_features.title: Real-Time Navigation
yomi_features.description: Continuous monitoring and adjustment during surgery ensures perfect implant positioning according to the pre-planned design.

procedure_timeline.title: 3D Imaging & Planning
procedure_timeline.description: Comprehensive 3D scan and digital treatment planning

procedure_timeline.title: Robotic Surgery
procedure_timeline.description: Precise implant placement using Yomi robotic guidance

procedure_timeline.title: Healing Period
procedure_timeline.description: Accelerated healing due to minimally invasive approach

financing.technology_fee: Advanced robotic technology included in all procedures

testimonials.text: The Yomi robotic surgery was incredible. Dr. Pedro explained every step, and the precision was amazing. I had minimal pain and healed so much faster than my friend who had traditional implants.
testimonials.author: Jennifer L.

testimonials.text: As a healthcare professional myself, I was impressed by the technology and Dr. Pedro's expertise. The robotic system gave me confidence in the outcome, and the results exceeded my expectations.
testimonials.author: Dr. Michael R.
